artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Minatoya Kohei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: on each, red artist\'s toshidama seal censor seals: 村田 {Murata}, 米良 {Mera}; publisher\'s seal: 並木、湊小版 {Namiki, Minatoko han}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Right: 梓元乃應需豊國画 {hanmoto no ōju Toyokuni ga}; C,L: 應需豊國画 {ōju Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Imayō mochizuki 今様望月, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1848, 8th month.
title: Actors Ichikawa Kuzō II as Mochizuki Saemon (R), Nakamura Utaemon IV as Ōtaka Tonomo (C), and Iwai Kumesaburō III as Innami Kazuma (L)
